details.title: • Dynamic YouTube Clone :
details.info: Used ''YOUTUBE API'' to fetch and display real-time video content accompanied with ''SHIMMER UI''.

details.title: • User-Centric Functionality :
details.info: Integrated Firebase for ''USER AUTHENTICATION'', enabling users to signin and like videos using ''CUSTOM HOOK''.

details.title: • Search :
details.info: Implemented an efficient search functionality with ''AUTOCOMPLETE'', ''DEBOUNCING'', ''CACHING'', and a dedicated search page for improved user experience.

details.title: • Enhanced Video Interaction :
details.info: Designed ''NESTED COMMENTS'' with ''LIVE CHAT'' functionality within the video watch section.

details.title: • Technologies Used :
details.info: React JS, React-Router-DOM, Redux Toolkit, CSS, and CSS3.

details.title: • Utilized Compound Components :
details.info: Designed a modular and extensible UI using ''COMPOUND COMPONENTS'', with ''SIGNIN'' and ''SIGNUP'' pages.

details.title: • Firebase Integration :
details.info: Integrated Firebase for ''USER AUTHENTICATION'' and ''DATABASE FUNCTIONALITIES, enabling secure user access and efficient data management.

details.title: • Fuse.js Live Search :
details.info: Implemented Fuse.js for ''REAL-TIME SEARCH'' functionality, enhancing user experience.

details.title: • Protected Routes :
details.info: Established ''PROTECTED ROUTES'' to restrict access to authenticated users.

details.title: • React Portal Integration :
details.info: Employed ''REACT PORTALS'' to render the Watch Page, providing responsive video playback experience.

details.title: • Technologies Used :
details.info: React JS, React-Router-DOM, Styled-Component, and Redux Toolkit.

details.title: • Redux Toolkit Integration :
details.info: Implemented Redux Toolkit for efficient state management, enabling seamless cart operations, including ''ADDING'', ''REMOVING'', and ''DELETING'' items.

details.title: • Search Functionality :
details.info: Designed and integrated a robust product search functionality, enhancing user experience with efficient product discovery.

details.title: • Product Details and Cart Integration :
details.info: Created individual product pages with ''Size and Color'' selection with ''Add to Cart'' feature, streamlining the shopping experience.

details.title: • Filtering and Sorting :
details.info: Developed a feature-rich product rendering page with various filters, enabling users to refine search results by SIZE, COLOR, GENDER, and PRICE.

details.title: • Technologies Used :
details.info: React JS, React-Router-DOM, Redux Toolkit, CSS, and CSS3.
